name: part_005
file: tmp_【#ときのそら５周年記念】想いをこめて届ける3D配信！ [TjGC7Jzc5ns]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song "Que Sera Sora!" (ケ・セラ・ソラ！).
Performance of the song "Sora no Toki" (そらのとき).

subtitles.original: 毎日で
subtitles.english: In our daily lives,

subtitles.original: 何でも思い通りとか
subtitles.english: not everything goes exactly as planned,

subtitles.original: そんな美味しい話はないけど
subtitles.english: there aren't many stories that easy, but

subtitles.original: 心の曇り空を晴らす合言葉
subtitles.english: when you chant the secret phrase

subtitles.original: 唱えたらね ほら 快晴でしょ
subtitles.english: to clear the cloudy skies in your heart, look, it's a clear day!

subtitles.original: ずっとみんなに届けたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep delivering to everyone

subtitles.original: 歌もダンスも元気も
subtitles.english: my songs, my dance, and my energy.

subtitles.original: きっと同じ空の下
subtitles.english: Surely, under the same sky,

subtitles.original: 笑顔も分け合えるよ
subtitles.english: we can share our smiles too.

subtitles.original: ちょっと疲れちゃうときも
subtitles.english: Even when you're a little tired,

subtitles.original: 涙が出そうなときも
subtitles.english: or when you're about to cry,

subtitles.original: いつもの魔法の言葉 今日も
subtitles.english: today too, the usual magic words are:

subtitles.original: ケ・セラ・ソラの空！
subtitles.english: Que Sera Sora's sky!

subtitles.original: 時にアイをソライ
subtitles.english: Sometimes, let love soar through the sky

subtitles.original: キミのソラをオドレ
subtitles.english: Dance in your own sky

subtitles.original: Wanna be a Superstar
subtitles.english: Wanna be a Superstar

subtitles.original: みんなクラップ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, clap!

subtitles.original: 呼吸(ログ)を更新しなきゃ
subtitles.english: I have to update my logs (breath)

subtitles.original: 昨日の夢は過ぎ去ってんだのさ
subtitles.english: Yesterday's dreams have already passed by

subtitles.original: 奇跡に替えたあの時だってさ
subtitles.english: Even those moments that turned into miracles

subtitles.original: 越えて 越えて 越えて 行くんだ
subtitles.english: I'll keep on crossing, crossing, crossing over them

subtitles.original: First MV 重ねた Stage
subtitles.english: Accumulating stages since the first MV

subtitles.original: Code name は 17 My offset
subtitles.english: Code name is 17, My offset

subtitles.original: ゼロの Dream に果てないで
subtitles.english: Don't let the dream from zero come to an end

subtitles.original: Come on, Follow! Every time, Every day, 止まらねーぞ！
subtitles.english: Come on, Follow! Every time, Every day, I'm not stopping!

subtitles.original: ブレーキがきかなかったあの日 アタシと
subtitles.english: That day when the brakes didn't work, with me

subtitles.original: ブレずと一緒にいて頂戴
subtitles.english: Please stay with me without wavering

subtitles.original: あなただけの Wanna be a Superstar
subtitles.english: A "Wanna be a Superstar" just for you

subtitles.original: Wanna wanna wanna wanna wanna be a Superstar!
subtitles.english: Wanna wanna wanna wanna wanna be a Superstar!

subtitles.original: 時にアイをソライ
subtitles.english: Sometimes, let love soar through the sky

subtitles.original: キミのソラをオドレ
subtitles.english: Dance in your own sky

subtitles.original: 煌き放て大きく舞われ
subtitles.english: Release your sparkle and dance grandly

subtitles.original: 虹色の輪 Our world
subtitles.english: A rainbow-colored ring, our world

subtitles.original: 悔しい日もあったね
subtitles.english: There were days of frustration, weren't there?

subtitles.original: 一緒に涙したね
subtitles.english: We shed tears together, didn't we?

subtitles.original: あの日があるから今がある
subtitles.english: Because of those days, we have today

subtitles.original: ついてきて！ OK?
subtitles.english: Follow me! OK?

subtitles.original: 時にアイをソライ
subtitles.english: Sometimes, let love soar through the sky

subtitles.original: キミのソラをオドレと共に Let's go!
subtitles.english: Together, let's dance in your sky! Let's go!

subtitles.original: 私達の未来は蒼の層
subtitles.english: Our future is a layer of blue

subtitles.original: 絶滅危惧のフェーズへ暴走中
subtitles.english: Racing towards an endangered phase

subtitles.original: 誰が進んだ？拒んでる暇はないんだ
subtitles.english: Who moved forward? There's no time to refuse

subtitles.original: やるんだ！やろうぜ！あたししかないんだ！
subtitles.english: Do it! Let's do it! It has to be me!

subtitles.original: 恐れる気持ちは皆同じだ
subtitles.english: Everyone feels fear the same way

subtitles.original: ひるんで引き返すのはあたしもだ
subtitles.english: I'm also one to flinch and turn back

subtitles.original: でもそんな時こその合言葉
subtitles.english: But that's exactly when we need the secret phrase

subtitles.original: Every time, Every day, 止まらねーぞ！
subtitles.english: Every time, Every day, I'm not stopping!

subtitles.original: アイをカラー 鮮やかにしてあげるわ
subtitles.english: I'll make the color of love vivid for you

subtitles.original: 輝く永遠のエキシビション
subtitles.english: A sparkling, eternal exhibition

subtitles.original: あなただけの Wanna be a Superstar
subtitles.english: A "Wanna be a Superstar" just for you

subtitles.original: Wanna wanna wanna wanna wanna be a Superstar!
subtitles.english: Wanna wanna wanna wanna wanna be a Superstar!

subtitles.original: 時にアイをソライ
subtitles.english: Sometimes, let love soar through the sky

subtitles.original: キミのソラをオドレ
subtitles.english: Dance in your own sky

subtitles.original: ぎゅっと抱き寄せ夢を奏でて
subtitles.english: Hold me tight and play the melody of dreams

subtitles.original: 虹色の輪 Our world
subtitles.english: A rainbow-colored ring, our world

subtitles.original: 無限に夢を発信
subtitles.english: Broadcasting dreams infinitely

subtitles.original: キミがいれば安心
subtitles.english: I feel safe as long as you're here

subtitles.original: キミと会えたからソラがある
subtitles.english: Because I met you, the sky exists

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Thank you!

subtitles.original: ずっとアイをソライ
subtitles.english: Always let love soar through the sky

subtitles.original: ずっとソラをオドレと共に Let's go!
subtitles.english: Always dance in the sky together! Let's go!

subtitles.original: みんなクラップ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, clap!

subtitles.original: クラップ！ クラップ！ クラップ！
subtitles.english: Clap! Clap! Clap!

subtitles.original: 宇宙の果ての正解をキミと探し当てたい
subtitles.english: I want to find the answer at the edge of the universe with you

subtitles.original: 最初の着陸はキミと挑みたい
subtitles.english: I want to challenge the first landing with you

subtitles.original: ひとつずつ思い出を作って
subtitles.english: Creating memories one by one

subtitles.original: ひとつずつ今を積み重ねて
subtitles.english: Accumulating moments one by one

subtitles.original: 同じ過去 同じ今
subtitles.english: The same past, the same present

subtitles.original: 同じ未来 享受できるだろう
subtitles.english: We'll be able to enjoy the same future

subtitles.original: 時にアイをソライ
subtitles.english: Sometimes, let love soar through the sky

subtitles.original: キミのソラをオドレ
subtitles.english: Dance in your own sky

subtitles.original: 煌き放て大きく舞われ
subtitles.english: Release your sparkle and dance grandly
